name: Premium Cotton T-Shirt
description: Ultra-soft 100% organic cotton t-shirt with a comfortable fit. Available in multiple colors and sizes. Perfect for casual wear.

name: Classic White Dress Shirt
description: Professional white dress shirt with French cuffs. Perfect for business meetings and formal occasions. Wrinkle-resistant fabric.

name: Slim Fit Dark Jeans
description: Modern slim-fit dark wash jeans with stretch comfort. Classic five-pocket styling with premium denim construction.

name: Denim Jacket
description: Classic denim jacket with a modern fit. Made from premium denim with subtle distressing. Perfect for layering in any season.

name: Leather Oxford Shoes
description: Handcrafted leather oxford shoes with Goodyear welt construction. Perfect for business or formal occasions.

name: Merino Wool Sweater
description: Cozy merino wool sweater with cable knit pattern. Soft, warm, and breathable. Perfect for cold weather styling.

name: Chino Pants
description: Versatile cotton chino pants in classic khaki. Perfect for business casual or weekend wear. Comfortable stretch fabric.

name: Leather Bomber Jacket
description: Premium leather bomber jacket with ribbed cuffs and hem. Timeless design with modern fit and premium hardware.

name: White Sneakers
description: Clean white leather sneakers with minimal design. Comfortable cushioned sole perfect for everyday wear.

name: Leather Belt
description: Genuine leather belt with classic buckle. Versatile brown color that pairs well with both casual and formal wear.

name: Polo Shirt
description: Classic cotton polo shirt with three-button placket. Perfect for golf, business casual, or weekend activities.

name: Dress Pants
description: Tailored dress pants in charcoal gray. Wool blend fabric with clean lines perfect for professional settings.

name: Wool Blazer
description: Structured wool blazer in navy blue. Classic two-button design with notched lapels. Perfect for business or formal events.

name: Loafers
description: Slip-on leather loafers with penny strap detail. Comfortable and versatile for both casual and business casual wear.

name: Watch
description: Classic analog watch with leather strap. Water-resistant with sapphire crystal face. Timeless design for any occasion.

name: Henley Shirt
description: Long-sleeve henley shirt in heather gray. Soft cotton blend with button placket. Perfect for layering or wearing alone.
